articles.author: Lori Bashian
articles.title: ‘American Idol’ judge Luke Bryan shares which stars have been ‘in the talks’ to replace Katy Perry on hit show - Fox News
articles.description: Luke Bryan shared who is in talks to replace Katy Perry as a judge on the next season of "American Idol." Perry left the show after seven seasons.
articles.content:
Luke Bryan is preparing himself for whoever ends up in the judge's chair that Katy Perry left empty.
In a new interview with Billboard, Bryan shared who audiences could expect to see replace Perry w… [+3216 chars]
